title: The Cold Frontier: A 'human zoo' at China's North Korea border
text:
The Cold Frontier: A 'human zoo' at China's North Korea border 6:47am EDT - 02:04 
Reuters' Sue-lin Wong took a weeklong reporting trip along the border between China and North Korea with photographer Damir Sagolj. They found a revealing tourism trade on the Chinese side offering a glimpse into the country's communist past through North Korea.   
Reuters' Sue-lin Wong took a weeklong reporting trip along the border between China and North Korea with photographer Damir Sagolj. They found a revealing tourism trade on the Chinese side offering a glimpse into the country's communist past through North Korea.  //reut.rs/2K0MXug
